page.title: 03Employment. Youth Scheme
page.content: A youth training scheme is run by the council it is intended to give young people employment.One such person is in our school.There was a wide variety of opportunity but she chose to work with children,even though she didn't have any say which school she would be placed in.On the scheme Michelle gets Â£26.25 per week plus Â£3.00 bus fare allowance for her{transport.}Michelle thinks the{youth}training scheme is a good idea because it gives young people a chance to{work.}She is better off now she has joined the scheme,as she is getting more money than she was on the social security and most of all she is gaining work experience.She would recommend it to other young people leaving school.
